html:
This spring, YouTube is launching new creation tools that will make it even easier to start creating Shorts. Here’s just a few of the updates:

  1. New and improved video editor: A top-requested feature from Shorts creators, this update will let you make precise adjustments and edits to the timing of clips with zooming and snapping, rearranging or deleting clips, adding music or timed text and previewing your Short.
  2. Sync edits to a beat: Pick a song and this tool will automatically align clips with the music's rhythm. No more manual synching!
  3. Templates: Hop on a trend using videos and photos. Now you can use a template by selecting multiple photos and videos from your gallery. When you use a Shorts template, the original creator will also automatically be attributed.

For all the updates and more information, head to the YouTube blog.
